Text: best snowboarding mive ive ever seen....good quality rip too..
Awesome!!! My buddy had this on blueray and it was Siiiick. Had to show my girlfriend.. i say Travis Rice's youtube add and it reminded me of this movie... Thanks... whoever!!

a/v 10:10.

Sick film. 

Also suggest seeing Brainfarm's latest: "The Art of Flight"

Both are sick. Love park and rails and all that jazz, but am a larger fan of powder, big airs, and freeriding on steep mountains and the dangerous stuff I typically put myself into here. (But not as hard core as the stuff these guys do. WOWzers)
